0100010010011011 1011001100101111 0 -> sum: 1111011111001010, cout: 0

1111001110010001 0111010010010001 1 -> sum: 0110100000100011, cout: 1
0011001110011001 0110101000011001 1 -> sum: 1001110110110011, cout: 0
0011110101011100 0010001011010011 1 -> sum: 0110000000110000, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
